issue.title: [CF 869] TellMeWhen Combat Event Start Spell Cast Bugged
issue.body:

comments.body:
You cannot filter by the destination unit for Spell Cast Start events. This is a Blizzard restriction. Please read the tooltips in-game before reporting a defect.
